title: Ehhhhh what? Master Yi went and done what now?
body:
As if he didn't hit hard enough late game, now they go and tell us his Q was bugged?

FFS, one phantom strike every second attack PLUS the double attack every 4/3 attacks will reduce his Q even further?

Yeh, how about you just keep the bug and make it a part of him, he already hits too hard, now he can dodge that much more.

replies.body: It's like the sun won't set in OCE everyday if there is no Yi QQ...

Nah man, I love Yi, my best champion, but hell, now I have to rewire my brain to work out the new CD's on his Q, it is going to screw our jungle paths, timing, the whole lot. Just that one extra second with every double strike is all it takes to throw us off from all that practice.
